channel.title: Need something D:
channel.description:
Okay, i need a piece of code for my server, it's like this:
When you kill someone in pvp you get 10k gold(it says "you get 10k for killing "a persons name here"). If anyone here has the code, please post it and say where i have to put it.
I'm using a palidino76 508 source.
Ty alot :D
